# Project general coding standards

## Executing commands, scripts, and programs

- Always use `devbox run <command>` to execute commands, scripts, and programs within the development environment.

## Naming Conventions

- Use `camelCase` for variable and function names.
- Use `PascalCase` for class and component names.

## Error Handling

- Always handle exceptions gracefully using try/except blocks.
- Always log errors with contextual information
